channel.title: Week 14: Complete Class Project on PSU Astro 528
channel.description: Recent content in Week 14: Complete Class Project on PSU Astro 528

item.title: Learning goals
item.description: Week 14 Project Characterize performance of class project Characterize performance as a function of problem size Characterize performance as a function of number of processors (both strong and weak scaling) Predict how much performance could be improved with further optimization/parallelization Make code easy for others to reuse Make benchmarks easy to reproduce (for their own system) Complete/clean-up project documentation and packaging
